Consolidated Waterworks District No. 2 -- 5.0 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Consolidated Waterworks District No. 2 Proposition
(Water Millage)
Race.FullText: Shall Consolidated Waterworks District No. 2 of the Parish of Jefferson, Louisiana (the "District") be authorized to levy and collect a tax of not to exceed five (5.0) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2023, with the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one year being $18,381,984, for the purposes of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating waterworks facilities in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Consolidated Sewerage District No. 1 -- 5.0 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Consolidated Sewerage District No. 1 Proposition
(Sewer Millage)
Race.FullText: Shall Consolidated Sewerage District No. 1 of the Parish of Jefferson, State of Louisiana (the "District") be authorized to levy and collect a tax of not to exceed five (5.0) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2023, with the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one year being $15,230,872, for the purposes of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating sewerage works and facilities within and for the District?
